actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the dollar limitation on the estate tax deduction for family-owned business interests shall not apply to interests in a business owned by a single family.
short_title: Family Business and Family Farm Preservation Act of 1998

summary.text: Family Business and Family Farm Preservation Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the $675,000 limitation on the estate tax deduction shall not apply to interests in a business owned by a single family. Establishes a reinvestment requirement on estates to which such limitation did not apply.

titles.title: Family Business and Family Farm Preservation Act of 1998

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the dollar limitation on the estate tax deduction for family-owned business interests shall not apply to interests in a business owned by a single family.
